title: Alexandro Jodorowsky's Screaming Planet
description:
Alexandro Jodorowsky's Screaming Planet

Part 1 - Humanoids, 2011, 56 pages
Part 2 - Humanoids, 2011, 71 pages


Written by Alexandro Jodorwsky

Illustrated by Marc Riou, Mark Vigouroux, Igor Baranko, Christian Hojgaard, J.H. Williams III, Jerome Opena, Axel Medellin, Adi Granov, Pascal Alixe, Ciruelo, Carlos Meglia, Jose Ladronn

A collection of Sci-Fi short stories all written by Alexandro Jodorowsky ("The Incal," "The Metabarons") and illustrated by talent from various countries and different graphic traditions. The thematic thread of these tales: an asteroid spawned from the destruction of a planet produces sounds (a "howling shriek") which, when crossing an inhabited world, creates a change or imbalance within itÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
